title: Special Preview - Up On Game with LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress - Can HBCU’s Compete with Power 5 Schools? PLUS Antonio Pierce!
itunes:title: Special Preview - Up On Game with LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress - Can HBCU’s Compete with Power 5 Schools? PLUS Antonio Pierce!
description:
LaVar Arrington, Plaxico Burress and T.J. Houshmandzadeh applaud Deion Sanders for single-handedly changing the game of college recruiting and question if HBCU’s can compete with Power 5 schools moving forward. The guys open up about how they would handle an extremely difficult situation that Vanessa Bryant is currently going through. Plus, Super Bowl Champion and Arizona State assistant Antonio Pierce joins the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
